data.title: Tamara Kotevska
data.text:
Documentary Film Directing

Visiting Lecturer (2022)

Tamara Kotevska finished primary school in Skopje. In her third year of high school, she got a scholarship for studying abroad in Tennessee, USA, for one year.

In 2012 she started studying at the faculty of Dramatic Arts in Skopje, where she is now on the fourth year of studies. In 2015, she participated in Sarajevo Film Festivalâ€™s Talent Campus.

In 2016, her script for Stuffed Life won the scholarship promoted by MIDPOINT Central European Script Center at the Eastweek Scriptwriting Workshop for New Talents at the Trieste Film Festival.

She directed the Oscar-nominated and Sundance winner documentary Honeyland (2019) together with Ljubomir Stefanov.
